quoteText: You own or otherwise have the lawful right to provide the information that you provide to Alignable or allow Alignable to access under this Agreement, and may request its deletion at any time, unless you have shared information or content with other Users and they have not deleted it, or it was copied or stored by other Users with your permission.
title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

tosdr.case: You can request access and deletion of personal data
